mapper.select: select id, did, danweijb, danweibm, mingcheng, miaoshu, jingdu, weidu, danweixz, danweigygx, danweibzyy, danweibzllid, zhudi, ganburs, zhanshirs, caiwubzrs, beizhuangbzrs, zhufangsl, creat_at from bzfx.tj_danweixx where id = #{id}

select id, did, danweijb, danweibm, mingcheng, miaoshu, jingdu, weidu, danweixz, danweigygx, danweibzyy, danweibzllid, zhudi, ganburs, zhanshirs, caiwubzrs, beizhuangbzrs, zhufangsl, creat_at from bzfx.tj_danweixx limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into bzfx.tj_danweixx(did, danweibm, mingcheng, miaoshu, jingdu, weidu, danweixz, danweigygx, danweibzyy, danweibzllid, zhudi, ganburs, zhanshirs, caiwubzrs, beizhuangbzrs, zhufangsl, creat_at) values (#{did}, #{danweibm}, #{mingcheng}, #{miaoshu}, #{jingdu}, #{weidu}, #{danweixz}, #{danweigygx}, #{danweibzyy}, #{danweibzllid}, #{zhudi}, #{ganburs}, #{zhanshirs}, #{caiwubzrs}, #{beizhuangbzrs}, #{zhufangsl}, #{creatAt})
mapper.update:
update bzfx.tj_danweixx
did = #{did},
danweibm = #{danweibm},
mingcheng = #{mingcheng},
miaoshu = #{miaoshu},
jingdu = #{jingdu},
weidu = #{weidu},
danweixz = #{danweixz},
danweigygx = #{danweigygx},
danweibzyy = #{danweibzyy},
danweibzllid = #{danweibzllid},
zhudi = #{zhudi},
ganburs = #{ganburs},
zhanshirs = #{zhanshirs},
caiwubzrs = #{caiwubzrs},
beizhuangbzrs = #{beizhuangbzrs},
zhufangsl = #{zhufangsl},
creat_at = #{creatAt},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select ${field},count(1) c from bzfx.tj_danweixx group by ${field}
